actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to prohibit Presidential appointees from subsequently acting on behalf of the Government of the People's Republic of China, the Chinese Communist Party, and Chinese military companies.
subjects: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption
Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

summary.text: This bill establishes postemployment lobbying restrictions on former presidential appointees who represent, aid, or advise certain Chinese entities, including Chinese government entities, the Chinese Communist Party, and Chinese military companies.
